review_title: Overall a good company to work for
pros:
Nice offices - Bright modern lots of desk space, nice shared building with great cafe. 

Good leadership at ELT level makes you feel cared for as an employee. Even though sometimes this doesn’t trickle down to the heads of service and managers. 

Good pay for most roles, there is opportunity to move up the pay scale but it’s a bit of a mystery how anyone does it (even HR don’t know). So once your in a role don’t expect to move up easily. 

There are some opportunities for promotion and many have moved up. Depends on the team and the hiring manager. Certain teams are great at it others overlook worthy candidates. 

Well being is high on the agenda ALWAYS! There are always activities around this and it’s great to be part of a company that prioritises this.
cons: Lack of parking - there are only a certain number of spaces allocated to bpha. Traffic in the area is a nightmare due to office location. This isn’t so much of an issue during this current times as most are working from home.
